function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases through contact with documents and articles.","Impact":"Potential spread of diseases if infected documents are handled without proper precautions.","Mitigation":"Regular sanitization of documents and articles, promotion of digital content over physical documents.","Technologies":"Digital document management systems, antimicrobial coatings for physical documents.","People":"Readers, researchers, and anyone handling physical documents.","Owner":"Organizations, institutions, and document management authorities."}]}
